communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Kick off with blunt accusations or rhetorical questions; vary openings.

narratives.c_essay: In my journey, I've faced constant rejection in dating, fueling my anger and resentment towards a society that seems stacked against me. As a college student, the pressure to succeed academically only adds to my stress. I find solace in swimming and exercising daily, but these activities barely scratch the surface of my deep-seated frustrations. My large meals are a small comfort in a world that feels increasingly hostile.
narratives.p_intro: Meet incel_0004_33c9d3, a young man navigating the turbulent waters of college life and social interactions. His days are filled with rigorous exercise and swimming, yet his mind is consumed by thoughts of dating failures and a perceived unfair social hierarchy. His aggressive online persona is a stark contrast to his social butterfly nature offline, as he grapples with his place in the world.
